00018 DialerWidget::DialerWidget(QWidget *parent):
00019 QWidget(parent),
00020 vendorBox_(this),
00021 libraryBox_(this),
00022 nameBox_(this),
00023 versionBox_(this),
00024 root_(NULL),
00025 vendors_(),
00026 libraries_(),
00027 names_(),
00028 versions_() {
00029 
00030         vendorBox_.setEditable(true);
00031         vendorBox_.setMaxVisibleItems(25);
00032         vendorBox_.setMinimumWidth(80);
00033 
00034         libraryBox_.setEditable(true);
00035         libraryBox_.setMaxVisibleItems(25);
00036         libraryBox_.setMinimumWidth(80);
00037 
00038         nameBox_.setEditable(true);
00039         nameBox_.setMaxVisibleItems(25);
00040         nameBox_.setMinimumWidth(80);
00041 
00042         versionBox_.setEditable(true);
00043         versionBox_.setMaxVisibleItems(25);
00044         versionBox_.setMinimumWidth(80);
00045 
00046         // set validator to accept only valid names and special characters '?' and '*'
00047         QRegExp regExp(QString("[a-zA-Z0-9:_-\.\*\?]*"), Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::W3CXmlSchema11);
00048         QRegExpValidator* validator = new QRegExpValidator(regExp, this);
00049         vendorBox_.setValidator(validator);
00050         libraryBox_.setValidator(validator);
00051         nameBox_.setValidator(validator);
00052         versionBox_.setValidator(validator);
00053 
00054         QLabel* vendorLabel = new QLabel(tr("Vendor"), this);
00055         QLabel* libraryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Library"), this);
00056         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name"), this);
00057         QLabel* versionLabel = new QLabel(tr("Version"), this);
00058 
00059         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00060         layout->addWidget(vendorLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00061         layout->addWidget(libraryLabel, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00062         layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00063         layout->addWidget(versionLabel, 0, 3, 1, 1);
00064         layout->addWidget(&vendorBox_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00065         layout->addWidget(&libraryBox_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00066         layout->addWidget(&nameBox_, 1, 2, 1, 1);
00067         layout->addWidget(&versionBox_, 1, 3, 1, 1);
00068         layout->setSpacing(0);
00069 
00070         connectBoxes();
00071 }

00076 void DialerWidget::setRootItem(const LibraryItem* rootItem ) {
00077         root_ = rootItem;
00078         refreshVendors();
00079 }
00080 
00081 void DialerWidget::refreshVendors() {
00082         Q_ASSERT(root_);
00083 
00084         vendorBox_.disconnect();
00085         vendorBox_.clear();
00086         vendors_.clear();
00087 
00088         vendors_ = root_->getVendors();
00089         QStringList vendorList;
00090         foreach (LibraryItem* item, vendors_) {
00091                 if (!vendorList.contains(item->getName()))
00092                         vendorList.append(item->getName());
00093         }
00094         vendorBox_.addItem(QString());
00095         vendorBox_.addItems(vendorList);
00096 
00097         connect(&vendorBox_, SIGNAL(editTextChanged(const QString&)),
00098                 this, SLOT(onVendorChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00099 
00100         onVendorChanged(QString());
00101 }
00102 
00103 void DialerWidget::onVendorChanged( const QString& vendorText ) {
00104         Q_ASSERT(root_);
00105 
00106         libraryBox_.disconnect();
00107         libraryBox_.clear();
00108         libraries_.clear();
00109 
00110         QString vendor = vendorText;
00111 
00112         // if the last character is not '?' then append '*' to the string
00113         if (!vendor.endsWith(QString("?"), Qt::CaseInsensitive))
00114                 vendor += QString("*");
00115 
00116         QRegExp regExp(vendor, Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::Wildcard);
00117         QRegExpValidator validator(regExp, this);
00118 
00119         // get the library items from the vendors that matched 
00120         int pos = 0;
00121         foreach (LibraryItem* item, vendors_) {
00122 
00123                 QString name = item->getName();
00124                 if (validator.validate(name, pos) == QValidator::Acceptable) {
00125                         libraries_ += item->getLibraries();
00126                 }
00127         }
00128 
00129         // add the library names to the combo box
00130         QStringList libraryList;
00131         foreach (LibraryItem* item, libraries_) {
00132                 if (!libraryList.contains(item->getName()))
00133                         libraryList.append(item->getName());
00134         }
00135         libraryBox_.addItem(QString());
00136         libraryBox_.addItems(libraryList);
00137 
00138         connect(&libraryBox_, SIGNAL(editTextChanged(const QString&)),
00139                 this, SLOT(onLibraryChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00140 
00141         emit vendorChanged(vendor);
00142         onLibraryChanged(QString());
00143 }
00144 
00145 void DialerWidget::onLibraryChanged( const QString& libraryText ) {
00146         Q_ASSERT(root_);
00147 
00148         nameBox_.disconnect();
00149         nameBox_.clear();
00150         names_.clear();
00151 
00152         QString library = libraryText;
00153 
00154         // if the last character is not '?' then append '*' to the string
00155         if (!library.endsWith(QString("?"), Qt::CaseInsensitive))
00156                 library += QString("*");
00157 
00158         QRegExp regExp(library, Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::Wildcard);
00159         QRegExpValidator validator(regExp, this);
00160 
00161         int pos = 0;
00162         foreach (LibraryItem* item, libraries_) {
00163 
00164                 QString name = item->getName();
00165                 if (validator.validate(name, pos) == QValidator::Acceptable) {
00166                         names_ += item->getNames();
00167                 }
00168         }
00169         
00170         // add the names to the combo box
00171         QStringList nameList;
00172         foreach (LibraryItem* item, names_) {
00173                 if (!nameList.contains(item->getName()))
00174                         nameList.append(item->getName());
00175         }
00176         nameBox_.addItem(QString());
00177         nameBox_.addItems(nameList);
00178 
00179         connect(&nameBox_, SIGNAL(editTextChanged(const QString&)),
00180                 this, SLOT(onNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00181 
00182         emit libraryChanged(library);
00183         onNameChanged(QString());
00184 }

00186 void DialerWidget::onNameChanged( const QString& nameText ) {
00187         Q_ASSERT(root_);
00188 
00189         versionBox_.disconnect();
00190         versionBox_.clear();
00191         versions_.clear();
00192 
00193         QString name = nameText;
00194 
00195         // if the last character is not '?' then append '*' to the string
00196         if (!name.endsWith(QString("?"), Qt::CaseInsensitive))
00197                 name += QString("*");
00198 
00199         QRegExp regExp(name, Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::Wildcard);
00200         QRegExpValidator validator(regExp, this);
00201 
00202         int pos = 0;
00203         foreach (LibraryItem* item, names_) {
00204 
00205                 QString name = item->getName();
00206                 if (validator.validate(name, pos) == QValidator::Acceptable) {
00207                         versions_ += item->getVersions();
00208                 }
00209         }
00210 
00211         // add the names to the combo box
00212         QStringList versionList;
00213         foreach (LibraryItem* item, versions_) {
00214                 if (!versionList.contains(item->getName()))
00215                         versionList.append(item->getName());
00216         }
00217         versionBox_.addItem(QString());
00218         versionBox_.addItems(versionList);
00219         
00220         connect(&versionBox_, SIGNAL(editTextChanged(const QString&)),
00221                 this, SLOT(onVersionChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00222 
00223         emit nameChanged(name);
00224         onVersionChanged(QString());

00228         Q_ASSERT(root_);

00231 
00232         // if the last character is not '?' then append '*' to the string

00246 void DialerWidget::connectBoxes() {

00248                 this, SLOT(onVendorChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00249         connect(&libraryBox_, SIGNAL(editTextChanged(const QString&)),
